metadata.title: CVE-2015-2213 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: SQL injection vulnerability in the wp_untrash_post_comments function inwp-includes/post.php in WordPress before 4.2.4 allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary SQL commands via a comment that is mishandled afterretrieval from the trash.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
